entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 this morning. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
